title: Compute p-value for two-sided test given one-sided

content.question: The p-value for a one-sided t-test is 0.10. If the test had been two-sided, what would the p-value have been?

choices.label: It depends on the direction of the alternative hypothesis.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Interpret statistical calculations and findings to assign meaning or assess a claim.
